other_tests.findings: 1-mm horizontal ST-segment depression in V6 and borderline 1-mm ST-segment elevation in V4R.
Normal coronary arteries; a small apical aneurysm containing a radiolucent filling defect was visualized.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The filling defect in the apical aneurysm was not seen 5 months later.

other_tests.findings: Did not demonstrate an intracardiac shunt.
Noted the posterior fractured tip of the seventh rib abutting a small clot covering the aortic adventitia.
4-mm puncture wound in the descending aorta adjacent to the seventh rib; no evidence of aortic dissection or intramural hematoma.
